Articles.Content: I Found this wierd bug. Remember in 0.24 when Resident_Crash_Lander reported the map Kraken? It happened on the PS4 when I was deorbiting 2nd stage. Suddenly, It smacked through my comsat when i was in the map, and it shot right through the map. It happened to fast to take a screenshot.
You shouldn't worry about it. Due to its rarity, it's more entertaining than annoying.

On 10/17/2017 at 4:36 PM, JK_Kerbineer said:

You shouldn't worry about it. Due to its rarity, it's more entertaining than annoying. 

Well, I guess you're right...
